snippet: Critics of Gov. Paul LePage failed to muster enough support to require a vote Thursday on an independent investigation that could have led to impeachment for alleged abuse of power.
abstract: Critics of Maine Gov Paul LePage fail to garner enough support to require House vote on independent investigation into some of his actions Democrats say could have led to his impeachment for alleged abuse of power.
lead_paragraph: Critics of Gov. Paul LePage failed to muster enough support to require a vote Thursday on an independent investigation that could have led to impeachment for alleged abuse of power.

headline.main: Maine: Move to Investigate Governor Fails
headline.print_headline: Maine: Move to Investigate Governor Fails
